Help Screen: G0014

Product Rules

• MinAge: Minimum Age

• MaxAge: Maximum Age

• MinSA: Minimum Sum Assured

• MaxSA: Maximum Sum Assures

• FclSA: FCL Sum Assured

• Freq: Frequencies

This parameter is configured using item(s) Freq in param P0050.

Multiple items from the list could be selected for this parameter.

• MethodOfPayment: Method of Payment (Cash, Cheque etc.)

This parameter is configured using item(s) MethodOfPayment in param P0050.

Multiple items from the list could be selected for this parameter.

• Currencies: Allowed Currencies

This parameter is configured using item(s) Currencies in param P0050.

Multiple items from the list could be selected for this parameter.
